cause.description:
Why are Americans dying because of lack of health care in the richest nation in the world? Answer, privatized medical care.
Medical care is a basic human right and should not be denied based on ability to pay.
1. Free medical care for everyone no matter what one's income.
2. The end of insurace companes fleecing Americans.
3. A healthier and happier America.
cause.mission: Free medical care to all American citizens no matter the income.
cause.name: Americans for Socialized Medicine
